title: Support Fedora on WSL?
body: Weâ€™ll send you updates on this idea

comments.body: I cant believe this is still not a thing.  There is a massive group of people chomping at the bit for this and from a technical perspective, it appears to be sorted.  But it is still stuck in Red Hat's court...  This is sad.
So sad. Probably will never happen. RHEL is scared to death of the market encroachment.
